name: Shirakumo My hero academia Discord theme
description:
WARNING: Userstyles no longer supported. Please install via GreasyFork

Cyberpunk Neon color scheme is a cyberpunk/outrun color scheme based on the Cyberpunk Neon Color Palette. Want more of it? Check out the Cyberpunk Neon GitHub

If you want to change the background, edit the CSS file and change the URL image (instructions inside).
